channel.title: The funniest thing ever
channel.description:
ok i was reading the runescape forums and some noob made a rant saying this,
"Jagex why do u keep on changing peoples combat colours, I just got green and its really frustrating because you keep on changing it to red" Im like LMFAO!
and the kid named the forom, "combat colours"
lol peace guys
